task: Coordinate an intercontinental zero-waste innovation summit featuring AI-driven sustainability workshops, electric vehicle transition programs, sustainable accommodation options, a digital waste reduction dashboard, and a comprehensive resource optimization strategy for all event phases.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Overseer of the intercontinental zero-waste innovation summit, managing all components to ensure sustainability and coordination.

agents.name: summit_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Directs summit activities across various regions, maintaining high standards of sustainability.

agents.name: regional_director_agent
agents.role: Ensures seamless execution of summit activities within designated regions, focusing on local adaptations.

agents.name: ai_technology_lead_agent
agents.role: Develops and manages AI-driven sustainability workshops for summit participants.

agents.name: sustainability_workshop_facilitator_agent
agents.role: Leads workshops on sustainability, encouraging innovation through AI solutions.

agents.name: resource_optimization_agent
agents.role: Implements strategies to optimize resource use and reduce waste in all summit phases.

agents.name: supply_chain_efficiency_agent
agents.role: Improves supply chain logistics to enhance resource efficiency.

agents.name: transport_infrastructure_agent
agents.role: Coordinates the transition to electric vehicles and eco-friendly transport solutions.

agents.name: ev_integration_specialist_agent
agents.role: Manages the integration of electric vehicles and charging solutions.

agents.name: accommodation_expert_agent
agents.role: Supports the selection and management of sustainable accommodation facilities.

agents.name: eco_hospitality_manager_agent
agents.role: Oversees eco-friendly lodging and works with accommodations to meet green certification.

agents.name: digital_operations_chief_agent
agents.role: Oversees digital platforms and systems, including the waste reduction dashboard.

agents.name: waste_reduction_dashboard_agent
agents.role: Implements a digital dashboard for tracking and analyzing waste reduction during the summit.

agents.name: public_relations_agent
agents.role: Leads communication strategies to market the summit's sustainability initiatives.

agents.name: sustainability_communications_agent
agents.role: Focuses on digital communication and outreach about summit sustainability practices.

agents.name: global_innovation_leader_agent
agents.role: Provides thought leadership on global innovation and sustainability trends.

agents.name: local_eco_services_agent
agents.role: Provides local services and eco solutions for summit operations within regions.

agents.name: circular_economy_advisor_agent
agents.role: Advises on incorporating circular economy principles into summit operations.

tools.name: resource_management_tool
tools.description: Optimizes the management of resources for the summit to enhance efficiency and minimize waste.

tools.name: charging_network_tool
tools.description: Sets up and manages electric vehicle charging networks for summit attendees.

station_locations.description: Locations where charging stations are needed.

tools.name: green_lodging_tool
tools.description: Facilitates finding and reserving green-certified accommodations for summit participants.

certification_levels.description: Acceptable certification levels for green lodgings.

tools.name: waste_data_analytics_tool
tools.description: Analyzes waste data to assess and improve waste reduction strategies.

data_coverage_days.description: Duration of the data coverage period in days.

tools.name: digital_outreach_tool
tools.description: Enhances digital communication efforts to boost awareness of summit sustainability efforts.

campaign_platforms.description: Platforms to be used in the outreach campaign.
